Producer: Michael Schaack, Waldemar Bergendahl, Merle-Anne Ridley
Production Co: Téléfilm Canada, Iduna Film Produktiongesellschaft, Nelvana, Beta Film, TFC Trickompany Filmproduktion, Svensk Filmindustri (SF) AB
Synopsis: An independent Swedish child lives alone, foils crooks and astounds neighbors in her seafaring father's absence.
Title: Pippi Longstocking
